statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET total_spent = 500.50, last_login = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 30, total_purchases = 5 WHERE username = 'johndoe';
UPDATE user_profiles SET total_purchases = total_purchases + 1, total_spent = total_spent + 12.50 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 30, gender = 'Female', last_login = '2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE username = 'alice';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com', birthdate='1995-08-20', username='newusername' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE purchase_history SET price=50.99, product_name='New Product', purchase_date='2022-09-15' WHERE purchase_id=201;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'new_email@example.com', birthdate = '1990-05-15', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE purchase_history SET price = 99.99, purchase_date = '2022-10-20', product_name = 'New Product' WHERE purchase_id = 456
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1001;
UPDATE purchase_history SET price=50.99, date_of_purchase='2022-05-20' WHERE purchase_id=2001;
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE purchase_history SET price = 49.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE purchase_id = 201;
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE addresses SET city = 'New York', zip_code = '10001' WHERE address_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, join_date = '2021-05-20' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE addresses SET city = 'New York', zip_code = '10001', state = 'NY' WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE purchase_history SET total_amount=1500.50, purchase_date='2022-01-30' WHERE user_id=456;
